name: poa-cli
description: CLI for Proof of Attention Protocol

scripts.copy-anchor-types: cp -R ../anchor/target/types/poa.ts ./types.ts && cp -R ../anchor/target/idl/poa.json ./idl.json && cp -R ../anchor/src/poa-exports.ts constants.ts && sed -i '' 's|../target/types/poa|./types|g; s|../target/idl/poa.json|./idl.json|g' constants.ts
